name: Bloated Meg
description:
This is an adapted tetris game. The character is a OC of mine, Meg, a cooking student who has a big appetite.

This game was entirely based on "Yuletide Sophia", by Hexalts, a very fun, and addictive game! I thought it was a great idea, and decided to make a new version of this game, with a OC of mine... Hexalt has a nice gallery, here is the link to his page on Deviantart, Itch and the link to his game

  •        Hexalt page: (Hexalto)
  •        Hexalt DeviantArt page: (Hexalt)
  •        Yuletide Sophia (Game): (Yuletide Sophia)

   
Thank you for playing! Feel free to post comments and report any bugs! ^^
Support us on Patreon: (www.patreon.com/encyclicalapex)
